      • getRecoveryConfig

        public RecoveryConfig getRecoveryConfig()
        Get the recovery configuration settings for this host. The configuration is set whenever any value changes. The agent uses this information to update the values on it's side.
        Returns:
        Null if nothing changed since the last update, else updated configuration.

      • setRecoveryConfig

        public void setRecoveryConfig(RecoveryConfig recoveryConfig)
        Set the recovery configuration. Set only when one or more recovery values change. This is to avoid sending the configuration to the agent during every heartbeat.
        Parameters:
        recoveryConfig -

      • getAlertDefinitionCommands

        public List<AlertDefinitionCommand> getAlertDefinitionCommands()
        Gets the alert definition commands that contain the alert definitions for each cluster that the host is a member of.

      • setAlertDefinitionCommands

        public void setAlertDefinitionCommands(List<AlertDefinitionCommand> commands)
        Sets the alert definition commands that contain the alert definitions for each cluster that the host is a member of.
        Parameters:
        commands - the commands, or null for none.
